infotexts.entitydescription.mm_container: Stores items of most any size.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_dvpoint: Used by traitors to access the Deep Vents.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_bloodscalpel: The blade rends through flesh with no resistance. Armor is a challenge, however.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_stunprod: A modified stun baton, using a strange contraption that seems to only accept perfectly round orbs as fuel.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_dime: Red gas, trapped in a blue field. Somehow, it's perfectly round.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_hypomaximdevice: A syringe-like device that holds a unique mechanism capable of directly reviving the dead, or storing the data of the alive so that a cloning machine may reconstruct them should they die.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_anechoicsuit: A stealthy, lightweight suit designed to absorb the sound waves of active sonar with its anechoic plating. It offers minor protection against damage and can withstand pressures of up to 4,000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_renegadedivingsuit: A diving suit utilised by Jovian Separatists to show which faction they are a part of, it has been designed to protect mostly against small arms fire. Has a depth rating of 5,700m.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_rpg: A simple 40mm recoilless muzzle loading launcher, as a result of not being restricted to the bore diameter, it is able to use a variety of warhead types for different purposes.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_combathardsuit: A powerhouse of a Diving Suit meant for heavy combat, featuring thick anti-ballistic materials and sharp angles to maximize deflection. However this suit severely hampers tool usage in addition to poorer oxygen cycling efficiency.
infotexts.entitydescription.mm_reversebeartrap: Wear it at your own discretion.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mm_monsterantipara: The patient is immune to paralysis.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mm_hypomaxim: Death refusal. Canceled out by extreme neurotrauma.
